name: Kuce
content:
Kuce was a Force-sensitive male Wookiee who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.
Kuce lived on the space station Burnout, and he worked for the Bothan Lolo Essumon, as a bodyguard. During the time of the Clone Wars, the Heroes of Cularin began searching the station for the Trandoshan Xirossk, and Essumon and Kuce confronted them, to find out what the heroes were up to.
